sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AWAQueueTimeoutUtility</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AWAQueueTimeoutUtility</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AWAQueueTimeoutUtility = Class.create();
AWAQueueTimeoutUtility.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {},

    _getQueuesWithMaxWaitTime: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('awa_queue');
        gr.addEncodedQuery("service_channel.typeINchat,messaging");
        gr.addActiveQuery();
        gr.addQuery('max_wait_time', '>', new GlideDuration(0));
        gr.query();
        return gr;
    },

    timeoutWorkItems: function() {
        var queueGr = this._getQueuesWithMaxWaitTime();
        while (queueGr.next()) {
            var maxWaitTime = new GlideDateTime(queueGr.getValue('max_wait_time')).getNumericValue();
            var currentTime = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue();
            var workItemGr = new GlideRecord('awa_work_item');
            workItemGr.addActiveQuery();
            workItemGr.addQuery('document_table', 'interaction');
            workItemGr.addQuery('state', 'IN', 'queued,pending_accept');
            workItemGr.addQuery('queue', queueGr.getUniqueValue());
            workItemGr.addQuery('sys_created_on', '<=', new GlideDuration(currentTime - maxWaitTime));
            workItemGr.query();
            while (workItemGr.next()) {
                var interactionId = workItemGr.getValue('document_id');
                workItemGr.setValue('state', 'cancelled');
                workItemGr.setValue('cancelled_reason', 'timeout');
                workItemGr.update();
            }
        }
    },
    type: 'AWAQueueTimeoutUtility'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-04-05 02:56:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5a336cfab3203300fcfb6e5f26a8dc06</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AWAQueueTimeoutUtility</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Agent Chat" source="com.glide.interaction.awa">2fe6aa472f000110d8a4d5f62799b6d7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5a336cfab3203300fcfb6e5f26a8dc06</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-03-24 21:06:50</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1500</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
